properties.name: test-library.actuator.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Library Actuator features.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.health.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Library health indicator.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.health.show-details
properties.description: Whether to include detailed component status.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.info.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Library info contributor.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.info.include-build
properties.description: Whether to include build information.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.info.include-features
properties.description: Whether to include feature flags.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.info.include-git
properties.description: Whether to include Git information.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SLI metrics collection.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.metrics.include-percentiles
properties.description: Whether to collect detailed percentiles.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.metrics.max-tags
properties.description: Maximum number of tags per metric.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.metrics.percentiles
properties.description: Percentiles to collect for timing metrics.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable package-based monitoring.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.exclude-packages
properties.description: Packages to exclude from monitoring. Methods in these packages will not be monitored, even if they have @IncludeMonitoring annotation.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.include-packages
properties.description: Packages to include in monitoring. Methods in these packages will be monitored by default, unless explicitly excluded with @ExcludeMonitoring.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.include-parameters
properties.description: Whether to include method parameters in monitoring. Use with caution to avoid high cardinality or sensitive data exposure.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.max-execution-time
properties.description: Maximum method execution time (in milliseconds) to record. Methods taking longer will be capped at this value for metrics.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.monitor-controllers
properties.description: Whether to monitor all @Controller methods by default.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.monitor-repositories
properties.description: Whether to monitor all @Repository methods by default.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.monitor-rest-controllers
properties.description: Whether to monitor all @RestController methods by default.

properties.name: test-library.actuator.monitoring.monitor-services
properties.description: Whether to monitor all @Service methods by default.

properties.name: test.library.actuator.custom-endpoints-enabled
properties.description: 是否啟用自訂Actuator端點

properties.name: test.library.actuator.endpoint-path-prefix
properties.description: 自訂端點路徑前綴

properties.name: test.library.enabled
properties.description: 是否啟用Test Library功能

properties.name: test.library.library-name
properties.description: Library名稱，用於AOP效能監控標識

properties.name: test.library.logging-standardization-enabled
properties.description: 是否啟用Log標準化

properties.name: test.library.performance-monitoring-enabled
properties.description: 是否啟用效能監控
